# Fleeting Fortune (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 round or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Champions of Valor (WotC), pg. 55

You imbue the subject with a bit of divine luck, granting her a +5 luck bonus on a single skill check of her choice. Activating the luck bonus requires no action but must be declared before the skill check is rolled.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Level changed to Cleric 1, if Initiate feats are used, change back to Initiate of Tymora 1.
